i1.name: Second Skin
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kai'Sa's''' basic attacks deal {{as|{{pp|7|4 to 10|1;3;6;9;11;14;17}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|5|changedisplay=true|1 to 5|1;4 to 16}} per Plasma stack)|buzzword}} {{as|(+ {{pp|5|key=%|type=Plasma stacks|changedisplay=true|10 to 20|0 to 4}} AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Caustic Wounds:}} '''Kai'Sa's''' [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}}, and nearby allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects mark enemies with {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. '''Kai'Sa's''' attacks or {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}} can then rupture enemies with {{as|4 Plasma|buzzword}}, consuming them to deal {{as|15% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''missing''' health}} {{as|magic damage}}, capped at 400 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Living Weapon:}} Upon gaining a set amount of permanent [[Champion statistic|stats]] from [[item]]s and {{tt|stat growth|Includes all stats gained when leveling (including base AD gained), but does not include stats at level 1.}}, '''Kai'Sa''' can evolve the related [[champion ability|basic ability]] after [[Channel#Unstoppable Channels|channeling]] for 2 seconds. The upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.
i1.notes:
* Allied {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects '''cannot''' rupture the {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}.
* {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} which exceed the 5th stack are applied normally.
* Stats from runes do not count toward the minimum requirement to upgrade a [[champion ability|basic ability]].
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Second Skin's'' application via basic attack interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}}, {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

r1.name: Killer Instinct
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' {{tip|shields}} herself and swiftly {{tip|dashes}} to a target location near an enemy champion {{tt|recently affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}|4 seconds after it's stacked or ruptured}}. The shield holds for 2 seconds upon arrival.
''Killer Instinct'' {{tip|Basic attack reset|resets}} '''Kai'Sa's''' basic attack timer.
r1.notes:
* '''Kai'Sa''' will issue a movement command to the targeted location regardless of whether the target location is valid. The dash is not buffered during this movement command. '''Kai'Sa''' will not dash if the targeted location becomes valid by walking in range or a nearby enemy champion becomes affected by plasma.
* If the targeted location is not valid, the range indicator will glow.
* The enemy champion recently affected by plasma must be in range of '''Kai'Sa''' for the targeted location to be valid, and not the targeted location itself.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.

effects.str: • Shield Strength: (+ % AD) (+ 75% AP)
